posts.tweetText:
Live from Solana Accelerate | NYC


@imsiddshetty
 shares Finternet’s vision:

- YOU at the center.
- UNIFIED ecosystems.
- UNIVERSAL access.

A new internet for finance — open, seamless, and inclusive for 8B+ people and 300M+ businesses.

#SolanaAccelerate #Tokenization

1/ Solana Mobile is launching its very first hackathon coming in June - the Solana Mobile Hackathon.

If you’re a builder, this is the perfect opportunity to build for mobile.

Learn more below
First 48 hours of Ignition Season 3 and these founder are already cooking something special.

GM from Accelerate!

So many events today that we can't even see everything on 1 page 

The one we won't miss is the Superteam Padel Mixer!

Can't wait to meet members from all over the world.
who’s still shipping after the hackathon?

Gm, everyone! My role as a Full Stack Engineer at 
@chompdotgames
 will ends this month. 

It was an exciting journey working with a talented team, learning a lot, building cool projects, and making unforgettable memories.

I'm thrilled to explore new opportunities in Full Stack

shoutout to everyone who’s submitted for the 
@colosseum
 breakout hackathon. so many of you pulled all-nighters, long sprints, pivots but didn’t give up — and that’s all that matters.

the hackathon is just the start. this is day 1 of breaking out. long way to go.

IPL is back!!! Perfect testing ground for us to run a test of the game.

Looking for some users to help run a simulation and test the flow of the app. Please DM here or on tg 
@lilfatfrank
 and I'll add you to the group. Will send funds to test as well.

Flow - 
1. go to the link

Big news! We’re hosting the first-ever official 
@cursor_ai
 meetup in India. 

Here’s what’s lined up:

 Live office hours with the Cursor team
 Power-packed tips & workflows from Cursor Pros
 Meet top-tier builders from Bangalore and beyond (yep, folks are flying in

This week in 
@solana
 staking ecosystem 

> 
@MarinadeFinance
 introduced Instant Unstake Beta 

> they also got 150k SOL staked ($22M) in a single txn

@SuperteamIN
 — Solana Security Dashboard ($5,000)

Goal: build an open-source Superteam security dashboard.

 1st: https://st-security.vercel.app
 2nd: …https://superteam-security-dashboard-swart.vercel.app
 3rd: …https://solana-security-dashboard-teal.vercel.app
W in the chat if you’ve submitted your project already

Superteam Members and friends: 

If you're coming to 
@solanaconf
 next week, you're invited to our Padel Mixer for a little friendly competition and lots of good vibes

Come meet your new & old internet friends to celebrate our community wins together

Limited spots. Sign up now!
*hits submit*

you've spent a month building your product for 
@colosseum
 breakout but your pitch deck is the first point of contact to get across. 

pls make sure to put enough time and thought into it till you're frustrated and then push some more 

linking a fresh template in replies -

get the camera out, make a script, load up loom. perfect that pitch deck & hit record. you've worked relentlessly for the past few weeks & this is what it comes down to. it's time to ship & make your vision real. hit that submit button. it's time to shine, it's time to break out.

I will be in NYC during Solana Accelerate and Stablecoin.

Who should I meet?

Banger

Hivemapper partners with 
@lyft
 to support their mapping. LFG!

trying to make the perfect pitch deck for the 
@solana
 breakout hackathon?

here's a walkthrough on how to go about making one.

timestamps here:
(00:00) cover slide
(01:43) problem slide
(03:35) solution slide
(05:50) market opportunity
(08:18) show, don't tell
(09:58) business
and ICYMI: here's a list of all the decks that were submitted by winners in the last 2 hackathons.

building your pitch deck for the 
@colosseum
 breakout hackathon?

we went through all the winners of the past two hackathons and compiled their decks in one place, separated by different tracks.

open-sourcing the sheet here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nyGn21mRiZyt_PP8w1FsEX9-D7R8NEw0cKo6AK0uO88/edit?gid=0#gid=0…
